attributes.action: add a new, up to date and more appropriate title to those already held by himself
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Gordon Brown has devalued the great office of Prime Minister by his actions and behaviour and has brought a once great country to it's knees. A new additional title of "Chief Bungler" will more accurately reflect his present role and contribution to our country and will now doubt be a precursor to the title of "Worst Prime Minister of all Time" which awaits him upon departure from office at the next general election.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
